TestGroupDocumentation.Title: totalDigits3 GetSet Tree Content tests
TestGroupDocumentation.Description: The tests for checking the content of trees got by unmarshalling of the totalDigits-3.xsd based XML documents and created dynamically via ObjectFactory. The schema defines a negativeInteger restricted SimpleType with totalDigits value 9. Various XML documents specify various values in the element.

TestCaseDocumentation.Title: NIST XML negativeInteger totalDigits-3.xsd, unmarshalled content tree GetSet test
TestCaseDocumentation.Description: The test unmarshalls totalDigits-3-1.xml,...,totalDigits-3-5.xml documents which specify the values -4, -492, -67735, -1115869, -325024874 for the negativeInteger restricted SimpleType NISTSchema-negativeInteger-totalDigits-3 element and expects that elemObj.getValue() returns specified in xml value, then invokes elemObj.setValue(negativeInteger), elemObj.getValue() should return set value.

TestCaseDocumentation.Title: NIST XML negativeInteger totalDigits-3.xsd GetSet test for dynamically created content tree
TestCaseDocumentation.Description: The test creates an instance of negativeInteger restricted SimpleType NISTSchema-negativeInteger-totalDigits-3 type with the values -4, -492, -67735, -999999999, -325024874 and expects that elemObj.getValue() returns specified values, then invokes elemObj.setValue(negativeInteger) with various values, elemObj.getValue() should return set values.
